page.title: 12SCUGDALE FARM
page.content: This area is mainly{farmland}with an area of{mixed deciduous}and{coniferous trees.This wood is called{West Hills. {Scugdale Farm}is used as a{dairy}farm with{125 milking cows.}The breed of cows are{Freisian.}The milk is collected every day by{Northern Dairy tankers and taken to{Middlesbrough}to be processed and bottled. The cows on this farm are{strip grazed}using {moveable electric wire fences.}The crops grown are{barley, wheat and oil {seed rape.}80% of the wheat and barley is used for their{own consumption}and the oil seed rape is sold as a{cash crop.
